mapper.select: select * from( select c.reviewnum, d.catenum, c.productname, c.sellerid, c.reviewcontent, c.reviewanswer, c.customerid, reviewwritedate from( select a.reviewnum, b.mcatenum, b.productname, b.userid sellerid, a.reviewcontent, a.reviewanswer, a.userid customerid, to_char(a.reviewwritedate, 'YY/MM/DD') reviewwritedate from review a join product b on a.productnum = b.productnum) c join category d on d.catenum = c.mcatenum where rownum<=${pageNum}*${onePageRecord} order by reviewnum desc) e where rownum<=${lastPageRecord} ${onePageRecord} order by reviewnum desc
